description: Yuri Ganus denies financial wrongdoing and says his dismissal is due to his zero-tolerance policy.
title: Yuri Ganus: Russia sacks head of sports anti-doping agency
title_page: Yuri Ganus: Russia sacks head of sports anti-doping agency - BBC News
maintext: Mr Ganus has called the report "deliberately fabricated" and believes he's being targeted for being so outspoken about the persistent problems with cheating in Russian sport. In a chilling recent tweet, Mr Ganus wrote that he loved life and was in no way suicidal: he explained that was because in 2016, his two predecessors died in swift succession.
